name: Spaceshifter
description:
You play an alien who has crash-landed on a strange planet and must

recover the scattered pieces of his spaceship in order to return home.
It's not Pikmin.

He can absorb the DNA of wildlife creatures and take on their forms
in order to help him get around the world. It's not Animorphs.

Use AWD or arrow keys to move. Space absorbs DNA from animals when close enough, shift or number keys changes form.

1st in Theme and 3rd place Overall for LD35 Compo!
